title: Sign changes in a word over real numbers

blocks.name: signspval
blocks.content: The value of the skipping 0 sign operation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm signspval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wcel(c1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1))), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), cif(c0, c1, wceq(c1, nat0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s0), cv(s1), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wcel(c1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), cif(c0, c1, wceq(c1, nat0))), wcel(cif(c0, c1, wceq(c1, nat0)), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)))
  ifcl(c0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), c1, wceq(c1, nat0))
  ovmpt2g(s0, s1, c0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), c1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(c0, c1, wceq(c1, nat0)), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), c2, cif(cv(s0), cv(s1), wceq(cv(s1), nat0)), cif(c0, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s1), nat0)))
  ifeq1(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))
  ifbieq2d(c0, cv(s1), c1, wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s1), nat0), wceq(c1, nat0))
  eqeq1(cv(s1), c1, nat0)
  id(wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.ctp.s(s0, cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cif.s(s0, c0, c1, wceq(c1, nat0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.ctp.s(s1, cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cif.s(s1, c0, c1, wceq(c1, nat0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c1, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}

} = {
  mpd3an3(c0 ‚àà { -u(1), 0, 1 }, c1 ‚àà { -u(1), 0, 1 }, (c0[c2]c1)= if(c1 = 0, c0, c1), if(c1 = 0, c0, c1)‚àà { -u(1), 0, 1 })
  ifcl(c0, { -u(1), 0, 1 }, c1, c1 = 0)
  ovmpt2g(s0, s1, c0, { -u(1), 0, 1 }, c1, { -u(1), 0, 1 }, if(c1 = 0, c0, c1), { -u(1), 0, 1 }, c2, if(s1 = 0, s0, s1), if(s1 = 0, c0, s1))
  ifeq1(s0, c0, s1, s1 = 0)
  ifbieq2d(c0, s1, c1, s1 = c1, s1 = 0, c1 = 0)
  eqeq1(s1, c1, nat0)
  id(s1 = c1)
  diff.ctp.s(s0, -u(1), nat0, nat1)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cif.s(s0, c0, c1, c1 = 0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, nat0)

  diff.ctp.s(s1, -u(1), nat0, nat1)

thm signsw0glem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wral(s0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat0), cv(s0))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s1, s2, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s1), cv(s2), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  rgen(s0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat0), cv(s0))))
  jca(wcel(cv(s0), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat0), cv(s0)))
  syl6eq(co(nat0, c0, cv(s0)), cv(s0), cif(nat0, cv(s0), wceq(cv(s0), nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s0), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(s0)), cif(nat0, cv(s0), wceq(cv(s0), nat0))), wcel(nat0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)))
  signspval(s1, s2, nat0, cv(s0), c0)
  pm2.61i(wceq(cif(nat0, cv(s0), wceq(cv(s0), nat0)), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat0))
  eqtr4d(cif(nat0, cv(s0), wceq(cv(s0), nat0)), cv(s0), nat0, wceq(cv(s0), nat0))
  iftrue(nat0, cv(s0), wceq(cv(s0), nat0))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), nat0))
  iffalse(nat0, cv(s0), wceq(cv(s0), nat0))
  syl6eq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat0), cv(s0), cif(cv(s0), nat0, wceq(nat0, nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(s0), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat0), cif(cv(s0), nat0, wceq(nat0, nat0))), wcel(nat0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)))
  tpid2(nat0, cneg(nat1), nat1)
  c0ex()
  signspval(s1, s2, cv(s0), nat0, c0)
  iftruei(cv(s0), nat0, wceq(nat0, nat0))
  eqid(nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

thm signswplusg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s0), cv(s1), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))))
  -| wceq(c1, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  ax-mp(wceq(c0, cfv(cplusg, c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  eqeltri(c0, universe, cmpo(s0, s1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s0), cv(s1), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))))
  mpt2ex(s0, s1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s0), cv(s1), wceq(cv(s1), nat0)))
  tpex(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)
  grpplusg(c0, universe, c1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1))
  diff.ctp.s(s0, cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.ctp.s(s1, cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

  mpbi(wceq(cfv(c0g, c0), nat0), wa(wcel(nat0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wral(hs0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, nat0), cv(hs0))))))

  mptru(wb(wa(wcel(nat0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wral(hs0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, nat0), cv(hs0))))), wceq(cfv(c0g, c0), nat0)))
  ismgmid(hs0, hs1, nat0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), c1, cfv(c0g, c0), c0, wtru)
  signswbase(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  signswplusg(s0, s1, c1, c0)
  a1i(wtru, wrex(hs1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), wral(hs0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))))
  mp2an(wrex(hs1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), wral(hs0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))), wcel(nat0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wral(hs0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, nat0), cv(hs0)))))
  tpid2(nat0, cneg(nat1), nat1)
  c0ex()
  signsw0glem(hs0, s0, s1, c1)
  rspcev(hs1, nat0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), wral(hs0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, nat0), cv(hs0)))), wral(hs0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  ovanraleqv(hs0, cv(hs1), nat0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs0), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(nat0, c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(nat0, c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs1), nat0))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), nat0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c0))

blocks.name: signswmnd
blocks.content: ` W ` is a monoid structure on ` { -u 1 , 0 , 1 } ` which operation retains the right side, but skips zeroes. This will be used for skipping zeroes when counting sign changes. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm signswmnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(c0, cmnd)
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s0), cv(s1), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))))
  -| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

blocks.name: signswrid
blocks.content: The zero-skipping operation propagages nonzeros. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Oct-2018.)

thm signswrid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wceq(co(c0, c1, nat0), c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1), cif(cv(s0), cv(s1), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wceq(co(c0, c1, nat0), c0)), wceq(c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c1))))
  eqtrd(co(c0, c1, nat0), c0, cif(c0, nat0, wceq(nat0, nat0)), wcel(c0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wceq(co(c0, c1, nat0), cif(c0, nat0, wceq(nat0, nat0))), wcel(nat0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)))
  tpid2(nat0, cneg(nat1), nat1)
  c0ex()
  signspval(s0, s1, c0, nat0, c1)
  mp1i(wcel(c0, ctp(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)), wceq(cif(c0, nat0, wceq(nat0, nat0)), c0), wceq(nat0, nat0))
  eqid(nat0)
  iftrue(c0, nat0, wceq(nat0, nat0))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}
